ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello
ygData.msgSnippet: 2GB of ram?!?! Isn t that a little excessive? Do you know if the 1.5 Ghz Duron has been released yet? I always double everything when it is availiable. I have
ygData.messageBody:
2GB of ram?!?! Isn't that a little excessive? Do you know if the 1.5 Ghz Duron has been released yet? I always double everything when it is availiable. I have a 750 Duron now and 512MB of ram. I guess I need to get a 1.5Ghz Duron, 1GB or ram and what ever video card is relatively cheap right now, guess ill have to do some research on that. Maybe a 19" monitor too.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 05, 2002 10:13 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello

I have the same video card and it runs great on mine. But it is a 64mb one..
and I have an AMD 1.4Ghz processor and 2Gb of RAM..
luv,
-Su


What video card do you have? I have a Geforce 2 MX. When I first started
playing with the Luclin expansion, it ran like crap until I turned down the
clip plane and then it ran great and all was well.
  ----- Original Message -----
  From: justin
  To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Thursday, April 04, 2002 5:06 PM
  Subject: [EverQuest] hello


      Hello everyone.  I am finally happy I finally got to play everquest
again.  I had to reformat my hard drive and reinstall everything in order to
do it but the game now works and with the new video card i picked up the
graphics are awsome!  Talk to you all soon.
